languages.text: Whenever an enemy suffering from any of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}-over-time effects {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} the Executioner's attack, all damage-over-time effects currently inflicted on that enemy now deal an additional +10% damage. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Whenever an enemy under an Executioner's DoT effect dodges Executioner's attack, all DoT effect on him start dealing 10% more damage. Stacks

Whenever an enemy under any Executioner's damage-over-time {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} the Executioner's attack, all damage-over-time effects suffered by that enemy start dealing an additional +10% damage. Stacks.

Whenever an enemy under any Executioner's damage-over-time {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effect{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} the Executioner's attack, all damage-over-time effects suffered by that enemy start dealing an additional +10% damage. Stacks.

Whenever an enemy suffering from any of the Executioner's damage-over-time {g|Encyclopedia:CommonStatusesGlossary}effects{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} the Executioner's attack, all damage-over-time effects currently inflicted on that enemy now deal an additional +10% damage. Stacks.

Whenever an enemy suffering from any of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}-over-time effects {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} the Executioner's attack, all damage-over-time effects currently inflicted on that enemy now deal an additional +10% damage. Stacks.

Whenever an enemy suffering from any of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}-over-time effects {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} the Executioner's attack, all damage-over-time effects currently inflicted on that enemy now deal an additional +10% damage. Stacks.

languages.text: Cada vez que un enemigo que sufre de cualquiera de los efectos de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} continuado del {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}ejecutor{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} un ataque del ejecutor, todos sus efectos de daño continuado actuales le infligen +10 % de daño adicional. Es acumulativo.
languages.original_text: Whenever an enemy suffering from any of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}-over-time effects {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} the Executioner's attack, all damage-over-time effects currently inflicted on that enemy now deal an additional +10% damage. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que un enemigo que sufre de cualquiera de los efectos de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} continuado del {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}ejecutor{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} un ataque del ejecutor, todos sus efectos de daño continuado actuales le infligen +10 % de daño adicional. Es acumulativo.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}エクスキューショナー{/g}による何らかの継続{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}効果を受けている敵がエクスキューショナーの攻撃を{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}するたび、その敵が現在受けているすべての継続ダメージが、追加で+10%ダメージを受けることになる。この効果はスタックする。
languages.original_text: Whenever an enemy suffering from any of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}-over-time effects {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} the Executioner's attack, all damage-over-time effects currently inflicted on that enemy now deal an additional +10% damage. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}エクスキューショナー{/g}による何らかの継続{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}効果を受けている敵がエクスキューショナーの攻撃を{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}するたび、その敵が現在受けているすべての継続ダメージが、追加で+10%ダメージを受けることになる。この効果はスタックする。

languages.text: 每当受到{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}行刑者{/g}持续{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}效果的敌人{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}行刑者的攻击时，该名敌人当前承受的所有持续伤害效果都会额外造成10%的伤害，此效果可叠加。
languages.original_text: Whenever an enemy suffering from any of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}-over-time effects {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} the Executioner's attack, all damage-over-time effects currently inflicted on that enemy now deal an additional +10% damage. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: 每当受到{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}行刑者{/g}持续{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}效果的敌人{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}行刑者的攻击时，该名敌人当前承受的所有持续伤害效果都会额外造成10%的伤害，此效果可叠加。

languages.text: Wenn ein mit {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}-über-Zeit-Effekten des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Henkers{/g} belegter Gegner dem Angriff des Henkers {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}ausweicht{/g}, verursachen alle Schaden-über-Zeit-Effekte, mit denen der Gegner belegt ist, +10 % Schaden. Stapelbar.
languages.original_text: Whenever an enemy suffering from any of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}-over-time effects {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} the Executioner's attack, all damage-over-time effects currently inflicted on that enemy now deal an additional +10% damage. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Wenn ein mit {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g}-über-Zeit-Effekten des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Henker{/g}s belegter Gegner dem Angriff des Henkers {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}ausweicht{/g}, verursachen alle Schaden-über-Zeit-Effekte, mit denen der Gegner belegt ist, +10 % Schaden. Stapelbar.

languages.text: Lorsqu'un ennemi souffrant d'un effet de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} progressifs infligé par l'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}exécuteur{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} une attaque de ce dernier, il subit +10 % de dégâts progressifs supplémentaires. Cumulable.
languages.original_text: Whenever an enemy suffering from any of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}-over-time effects {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} the Executioner's attack, all damage-over-time effects currently inflicted on that enemy now deal an additional +10% damage. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Lorsqu'un ennemi souffrant d'un effet de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} progressifs infligé par l'{g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}exécuteur{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} une attaque de ce dernier, il subit +10 % de dégâts progressifs supplémentaires. Cumulable.

languages.text: Когда противник, на которого {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}палач{/g} наложил какой-либо эффект периодического {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклоняется{/g} от атаки палача, периодический урон от всех эффектов, действующих на этого врага в данный момент, увеличивается на 10%. Эффект суммируется.
languages.original_text: Whenever an enemy suffering from any of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}-over-time effects {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} the Executioner's attack, all damage-over-time effects currently inflicted on that enemy now deal an additional +10% damage. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Когда противник, на которого {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}палач{/g} наложил какой-либо эффект периодического {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклоняется{/g} от атаки палача, периодический урон от всех эффектов, действующих на этого врага в данный момент, увеличивается на 10%. Эффект суммируется.

Когда противник, на которого {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}палач{/g} наложил какой-либо эффект периодического {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклоняется{/g} от атаки палача, периодический урон от всех эффектов, действующих на этого врага в данный момент, увеличивается на 10%. Эффект суммируется.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Cellat{/g}'ın zamanla {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} veren etkilerinden muzdarip olan bir düşman, Cellat'ın saldırısından her {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçındığında{/g} o düşmanda hâlihazırda bulunan tüm zamanla hasar veren etkiler artık +%10 ilave hasar verirler. Etki üst üste birikebilir.
languages.original_text: Whenever an enemy suffering from any of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerExecutionerGlossary}Executioner{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}-over-time effects {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodges{/g} the Executioner's attack, all damage-over-time effects currently inflicted on that enemy now deal an additional +10% damage. Stacks.
